Text.val: The View Refresh forces the range to reset and the records to be reloaded
when the user changes the tab choice.

ExpSyntax.val: 'DV01: How Do I Retrieve the Number of Records in a Taskâ€™s Data View?'
IF(EmptyDataview(0),'No matching names found', Trim(Str(DbViewSize(0),'5C')) & IF({0,1}='',' names total', ' names for the letter ') & {0,1})

Text.val: This task writes to two text BLOBS, then reads them into a memory table.
This reads in the blob, using a ':' as a delimiter
